generator = pipeline("text-generation", model="gpt2")

def generate_synthetic_data(prompt, num_samples=10):
    """ç”Ÿæˆåˆæˆè®­ç»ƒæ•°æ®"""
    synthetic_data = []
    
    for _ in range(num_samples):
        result = generator(
            prompt,
            max_length=200,
            num_return_sequences=1,
            temperature=0.7,
            do_sample=True
        )
        synthetic_data.append({
            'text': result[0]['generated_text'],
            'source': 'synthetic',
            'prompt': prompt
        })
    
    return synthetic_data

def mix_real_and_synthetic(real_data, synthetic_data, ratio=0.7):
    """æ··åˆçœŸå®æ•°æ®å’Œåˆæˆæ•°æ®"""
    num_real = int(len(real_data) * ratio)
    num_synthetic = len(real_data) - num_real
    
    mixed = random.sample(real_data, num_real) + random.sample(synthetic_data, num_synthetic)
